segment.source: Monitoring and Reporting BitLocker Compliance with MBAM 1.0
segment.target: Monitoring and Reporting BitLocker Compliance with MBAM 1.0

segment.source: If you use Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM), you can generate various reports to monitor BitLocker usage and compliance activities.
segment.target: If you use Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM), you can generate various reports to monitor BitLocker usage and compliance activities.

segment.source: MBAM reports have many fields that you should be familiar with before you generate MBAM reports.
segment.target: MBAM reports have many fields that you should be familiar with before you generate MBAM reports.

segment.source: If you use MBAM reporting, you can generate reports on enterprise compliance, individual computers, hardware compatibility, and key recovery activity.
segment.target: If you use MBAM reporting, you can generate reports on enterprise compliance, individual computers, hardware compatibility, and key recovery activity.
